entities.name: ron
entities.description: The narrator of the story, Ron is concerned about the potential consequences of their actions. He says 'Clear up?' indicating that he wants to clarify or explain something.

entities.name: café
entities.description: A partly destroyed café where Ron and others are located. The café is described as looking like it's 'just been bombed'.

relationships.description: Ron is located at the partly destroyed café. He says 'looking around at the partly destroyed café' indicating his physical presence there.
